receive-poisonedcoralmilk.speaker: Takara
receive-poisonedcoralmilk.text: Oh...@ for me?@ You brought Coral Milk?@ How thoughtful...@ You remembered it's my favorite.

options.text: Of course. I wanted you to have it.

coralmilk_gift_accept.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_gift_accept.text: It smells right.@ Soft and sweet.@ You even warmed it...@ you must have gone to such trouble just for me.

options.text: It's the least I could do.

coralmilk_gift_drink.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_gift_drink.text: Mmm... it tastes familiar.@ The coral's warmth, the little salt crystals on the rim...@ just like I make it...

coralmilk_reaction.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_reaction.text: ...But there's something different.@ The taste lingers strangelyâ€”@ sharper, colder.@ Like a word spoken with a smile that doesn't reach the eyes.

coralmilk_doubt.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_doubt.text: No... it's fine.@ It's just... when I drink Coral Milk, I usually feel peace.@ But now, I feel... distance.@ Like there's a wall of glass between us.

options.text: Maybe it's just different this time.

coralmilk_suspicion.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_suspicion.text: Different...@ yes.@ That's exactly what it is.@ Different tone, different warmth.@ Like the drink knows something I don't.

options.text: You're reading too much into it.

coralmilk_realization.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_realization.text: Maybe it isn't the milk that's strange.@ Maybe it's you.@ There's a quiet in your voice that wasn't there before.@ Like you're holding a secret in your mouth along with my drink.
